name: Giggle: The Quest
description:
(PRODUCTION HAS BEEN HALTED INDEFINITELY. PROJECT MOVED TO GIGGLE: DX)Giggle: The Quest The evil Firebuns has taken over Bunriel's three fortresses, and he plans on taking the castle next. Sir Gigglebuns III will not let this happen! Take back the three fortresses filled with monsters and puzzles back from Firebuns' reign! Bring peace back to Bunsriel!

All graphics belong to "Lucid Design" http://luciddesignart.tk/

All music and sound effects done by me, Michael Redmond.
